definitions.definition: To drink ( usually by gulping or in a greedy or unrefined manner ) ; to quaff .
examples: That sailor can swig whisky with the best of 'em.

definitions.definition: To take up the last bit of slack in rigging by taking a single turn around a cleat , then hauling on the line above and below the cleat while keeping tension on the line.

main_definition: To drink ( usually by gulping or in a greedy or unrefined manner ) ; to quaff .
secondary_definitions: ( nautical ) To take up the last bit of slack in rigging by taking a single turn around a cleat , then hauling on the line above and below the cleat while keeping tension on the line.
